title: gccgo: internal compiler error: Segmentation fault (program go1)
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

tar -zxvf tmp4mNEe9.tar.gz
cd tmp4mNEe9
gccgo -o -c *.go

What do you see instead?

gccgo: internal compiler error: Segmentation fault (program go1)

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

gccgo

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

gcc version 4.7.0 20110505 (experimental) (GCC)

3dab2b60c7a3ea30e4b677d2c4acd65af44302df

git-svn-id: svn+ssh://gcc.gnu.org/svn/gcc/trunk@173785
138bc75d-0d04-0410-961f-82ee72b054a4
Attachments: 1. tmp4mNEe9.tar.gz (19993 bytes)
